message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the lion's share, but I'm willing to negotiate if you're not happy.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. This offer won't be as good in future rounds due to inflation, especially for you.
I'm still feeling a bit stingy, but I'm willing to compromise.  This offer is better for both of us than the last one, and we can avoid further inflation.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you the same amount you offered me last round, but with the roles reversed.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
